product_name: Voile Wasatch Speed Project Backcountry Skis - Men's - 2014/2015
long_description: The Wasatch Speed Project backcountry skis have ample tip rocker and Voile signature lightweight construction for fast ski mountaineering trips and randonee races from the Wasatch to Chamonix.
short_description: The Wasatch Speed Project backcountry skis have ample tip rocker and Voile signature lightweight construction for fast ski mountaineering trips and randonee races from the Wasatch to Chamonix.
